website_summaries.verdict: Be sure your video connection is absolutely private thanks to secure FHSS technology from Philips AVENT.
pros: The 3.5" color monitor features FHSS technology, giving you a secure, private connection
Video camera is wall mountable and designed for automatic infrared night vision
2-way talk-back feature helps you soothe baby with your voice
Also provides night light and lullabies
cons: Several reports of problems with charging ports over time

customer_reviews.title: which has rendered this device useless. This monitor is too expensive to be this ...
customer_reviews.text: ***Edit*** my wife called Philips customer service and they are sending a replacement unit; while this will be our third monitor in a little over a year, the customer service warrants and extra star from two to three. these monitors function decently, but are very poorly constructed. Our first one lasted about 1 month before the charging port ceased to work. At least Amazon replaced it for a new one. Now, after around a year, the power button on the replacement does not work at all, which has rendered this device useless. This monitor is too expensive to be this poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Screaming Crab

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS MONITOR!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS MONITOR!!!! I purchased one back in March 2017 it lasted 6 months before the plug on the monitor broke and we could no longer charge it. So I bought another one and just received it today... it already has the EXACT same problem and it’s brand new! Read the other reviews, a lot of people have had the exact same problem! No joke, this thing is a piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Best range & audio
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this after the popular infant optics monitor couldn’t stay in range from our son’s room upstairs to our room downstairs. This Philips monitor handled the range no problem! The audio is so clear that I can sometimes hear him breathing through the monitor. I like the “eco” feauture where the monitor can go to sleep until it detects noise then it “wakes up” the video & audio. Only reason for 4 stars is that you can’t add a second camera for an additional child.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Summer brand video monitor because the range was insufficient for our home. This one has been much more reliable and is able to work in almost every corner of our 4000sq foot home and in much of the surrounding yard. The video and sound quality are great and the system is easy to operate. I wish I'd made the switch sooner.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful invention. It can be used for monitoring not ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful invention. It can be used for monitoring not only babies, but also for monitoring any family member who might need watching. (For example, an elderly patient.) The picture is clear, and the sound is amazingly sharp. The camera and the microphone pick up the slightest move, and the slightest sound. The Caregiver can move far away from the baby or the patient while carrying the monitor, and observe what the child or the patient is doing. The cost is a small investment for a large amount of Peace of Mind. Besides, who can put a price on keeping our loved ones safe?
customer_reviews.author: Delighted Customer

customer_reviews.title: Open-box item turned into an all-time favorite purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The. Best. Investment. It works flawlessly through multiple doors and walls. Our children’s naptime has been so much less stressful. They share a room, and I can check on one without opening the noisy ancient door up and inadvertently waking up the other. I can remind our toddler to get back in his bed without being spotted by our baby. I love all the features! The downside, to me, is how activating the intercom shuts off the music, but it’s easy enough to reopen the music menu.
customer_reviews.author: mabel2009

customer_reviews.title: Great baby monitor, does exactly what it's supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: We love this baby monitor. With all electronics these days being chock-full of features you don't need that make the whole thing work poorly, this baby monitor is dead simple and works perfectly. I can tell when my baby is awake, even at night, and the sound is spot-on so I know how much she is actually crying. Two requests if anyone at the company reads these reviews - a clock on the screen, and a "night mode" that dims all the blinking lights.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for a year or so
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a year or so. Then, the charging port on the monitor came loose inside, so we had to really wiggle with the chord to get it to charge. Managed to keep it working for several more months like this. It finally gave up completely. I opened it up and found the charging socket was attached very poorly on the base, hence it came loose with use. Tried fixing it unsuccessfully (it simply won't stay on the base once you put the plug in). Tried super glue, but mostly made a mess and still no charging. It lasted 1 year and 8 months total. Not great for a device worth $150.
customer_reviews.author: Petrini

customer_reviews.title: Already opened box, not new as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tries this yet but based on the initial unboxing I'm giving it a 1 star because it was advertised as new and obviously had already been opened. The charging cord was laying on top and there were several empty bags right below it. I am returning this item and will edit this review if I receive a new unopened item to try.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: A decent dedicated baby monitoring option
customer_reviews.text: The best of the available dedicated baby video monitors. Still nowhere near what the best IP security cameras (Arlo, NestCam etc) can do in terms of image quality, but this unit provides ok audio quality, integrated temperature sensor and reasonable video - enough to be able to tell when the baby is disturbed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Reid

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor with audio only capability
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. We wanted a video monitor with the option to have audio only (which this does). The signal does cut out momentarily sometimes even when we are well within range but it’s ttypically for a split second. I wish there was a clock on the monitor so I could know exactly when I put baby down and the thermostat is slightly off (we compared with our temperature gun and the monitor reads about 2 degrees cooler than the room actually is). *update: after two years of use it’s starting to malfunction. Battery dies unexpectedly, sound goes in and out.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well - lots of flaws
customer_reviews.text: This monitor does not stay “on”.... the power is on but I can’t hear anything in the nursery unless my child is screaming! I have the volume up high but it just stays silent (no fuzzy white noise to pick up small noises). It’s frustrating and for the cost it should work. The talk back feature is insanely loud - if you have other children in the house who thinks it’s funny to try and talk to the baby via the monitor it sounds like a monster yelling from an abyss. If you silence the camera portion or turn it off THE loudest beeps start from the monitor and continue until you turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Burk7556

customer_reviews.title: Plug wore out in three months.
customer_reviews.text: I was reasonably happy with this in the beginning. But we've only been using it for three months, and the plug no longer fits securely, meaning you have to play around with the cable to get it to charge every time you move the thing. Just what sleepy mom's want to deal with!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Quality- works reliably
customer_reviews.text: It’s reliable and has a really good range on it, reaches two floors down into our basement and outside into the yard. The picture quality while not the highest resolution is reliable and switches to night vision in the dark. It also has a lot of little convenient features built in.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good service, quality of the device could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The charging connector started acting up after 8 months but it would still charge so I did not bother going to customer service. Unfortunately, now it stopped charging and is out of warranty. Luckily Philips made an exception and still replaced the unit. Take this as a warning, best send it for repair as soon as possible :)
customer_reviews.author: E.T.

customer_reviews.title: Everything works perfect. Camera power cable is about 6ft
customer_reviews.text: Picked mine up from the used/open box special. Everything works perfect. Camera power cable is about 6ft. I wouldn’t say the picture is HD or even 1080p, but the color is fine and the picture is more than clear enough to see what is going on. Be cautious turning the sound up in the same area as the camera. The microphone is super sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: The camera and monitor are great, but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The camera and monitor are great, but not very durable. After 8 months, the charging connector in the monitor stopped working, making it useless. I was expecting more quality from a Philips Avent product and this price range!
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo Gaia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent photo quality, excellent range through 3 concrete walls could see and hear.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Saliba

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about its reliability..
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 3-stars because occasionally the screen blacks out! I don't need the monitor at night. So, it's not much of a concern to me, but this would be awful for someone who relies on this 24-7. Maybe, mine is just defective?
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Poo quality- would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Had had this a little over a year, it only sits on. Our night stand and still even has the plastic on the screen but the charger to the last 6 months has been a nightmare and doesn’t charge the monitor. It falls out of the charging port on its own. It’s become useless and we have been unable to use it . Waste of money !
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Young

customer_reviews.title: Power button failures all over the place
customer_reviews.text: After maybe 4 or 6 months of owning this expensive monitor, the power button on the camera stopped working. That wasn’t a huge issue as I wasn’t really turning that off and on much anyway. HOWEVER, at promptly one year of use, the power button on the parent unit has ceased functioning. We even took it apart to see if we could unjam things. Up until one year, this has been a pretty great monitor. Love the temperature feature, love that it’s not WiFi. It’s been pretty easy to travel with. Picture does what I need it to. But $150+ dollars for a monitor that dies after 12 months is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, but sound went out a few months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby monitor, BUT, the sound started dropping a few months after I bought it. We use it in our bedroom when go to sleep, so the sound going out is no bueno since that’s the part that wakes me up to let me know she’s up. Other than that, it’s perfect. Picture is great, etc. That being said, I contacted amazon and they re-sent out a new one free of charge, easy breezy, so it all worked out. Let’s just hope the sound doesn’t go out on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Emileejanel

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for 8 months and I’m very pleased with it. Its range is good in my townhouse with plaster walls and the battery life is excellent. It lasts through my baby’s naps throughout the day and I charge it every night. I have not had any problems with the charging port.
customer_reviews.author: B. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Lemon x 2
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these as a gift, and after a week the camera unit just stopped working (light stopped turning on when plugged in). Returned it, and purchased a new one because I liked the features (or so I thought) and at least knew how to use it. After about 2 weeks, the camera unit stopped sending a signal to the parent unit. For nearly $200 it's a total piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney F

customer_reviews.title: baby unit lights up red
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 8 months ago in USA. THis product is not sold in my country. Now baby unit does not work. The power on light on the baby unit lights up red. I try to contact via twitter Philips care and I also call Philips Turkey. No one helps me. If there is any comment for this situation, please help me. For ex, how can I reset baby unit part? I can try to repair it myself.
customer_reviews.author: c c

customer_reviews.title: making it basically useless..
customer_reviews.text: The monitor stopped providing any audio (!?!?!) after about 2 months of use, making it basically useless....cannot figure out how to contact customer service
customer_reviews.author: Laura L

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS MONITOR
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had put more value into other reviews and not purchased this monitor. After 6 months it has stopped charging - like other reviews have said. Save yourself time and money and purchase another monitor. I would have expected more from Phillips, so am very disappointed in this product. And calling their customer support to get a replacement or refund in warranty is a joke. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Long

customer_reviews.title: We LOVED this monitor the video is amazing
customer_reviews.text: We LOVED this monitor the video is amazing, the sound is great too, its a two way so you can talk back to your baby to soothe them and the music is a great feature to... BUT the battery port died very quickly so it lasted just shy of a year for us because the charging port no longer took to the monitor. Make sure to leave it unplugged and work on true battery as much as possible, if you leave it plugged in constantly this monitor wont last long... otherwise I think its the best ive seen yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. Works great, even after my now toddler has thrown the parent monitor multiple times. The only thing I think would improve this is if you were able to add additional cameras.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Power button stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It was working great for a couple months until the power button on the camera stopped working so I gave to unplug it now which is very annoying I'm going to try to contact them for a replacement otherwise I'm returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: nnoor2

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the monitor. I love being able to see my baby in day light or at night. Video is very clear even in the dark. Volume only goes on when baby is making sounds....which I didn't realize at first. Baby's crib is on the 3rd floor of house and I still get a clear signal moving through all the floors
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: We love this monitor! It's perfect for night and morning. I like that you can switch the video off for bed and keep the audio on. I also love the picture quality and how the audio only comes on when sound is detected.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was fantastic at first. It lasted 11 months. The charging cord does not stay in place. The on/off botton sticks. It ran out of power when the cord fell out overnight. The button is stuck. Now I can not turn it on. It had a great range, loved the camera features and lullabies. Sadly I feel like I wasted money. I will be purchasing something different as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good monitor
customer_reviews.text: good camera. Sometimes need to turn the room light bright to get rid of the grey/black/light/ghosty night vision look. But then the color and clarity improves and stays with moderate room light. Use it to help prevent falls for a senior.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: We've been very happy with this monitor, which we've been using for about a year. A microwave will interfere with it, and the signal sometimes drops out when the monitor is outside on the far side of the house from the baby's room. Those have been easy limitations to live with.
customer_reviews.author: john hume

customer_reviews.title: best baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: nice monitor . clear picture and voice . we looove the eco mode at night
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I can see her chest move up & down as she breathes. I can also see if her eyes are open or shut in the dark. The sound is not great but I’m super happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is not very clear unless you have it super close to the crib. I tried to install it on the wall but the picture quality was so bad I couldn’t see much of baby’s features with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordeliz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect. You can play music, talk to baby, see and hear baby clearly. I am so glad we bought it and would totally buy it again. At first the video was fuzzy but was perfect after I remembered to take the protective plastic off of the camera. Just saying so that any who buy will remember.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsee

customer_reviews.title: Picture isn’t great at all and the battery dies very quickly even ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture isn’t great at all and the battery dies very quickly even in eco mode. It works but I wouldn’t recommend it:(
customer_reviews.author: Momofthree

customer_reviews.title: perfect and stable
customer_reviews.text: plugged in for months and no problem so far. not a single restart needed.
customer_reviews.author: nana

customer_reviews.title: Power button broke
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with this monitor, though the power button suddenly became stuck in the "off" position today. It has had light use for only a year. I have contacted the manufacturer to see if they might be able to assist.
customer_reviews.author: Griff Gatewood

customer_reviews.title: We love this monitor BUT after 4 months the off/on button ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this monitor BUT after 4 months the off/on button broke. Tried contacting amazon but they aren’t sending a new one since the return period has ended.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: This is working how I'd expect it to. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is working how I'd expect it to. I didn't want to use a system that wasn't always on e.g. a cell phone security camera setup.
customer_reviews.author: R. Baird

customer_reviews.title: Best available
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Bought one to monitor my hubby w/Alzheimer’s so I could rest. Works great and from a far distance all over my 3600 sq ft house
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the vibration feature! Wish the screen would dim a little more.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hoerth

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this less than a year ago and it already stopped holding a charge. The screen is now going out, too. It also doesn’t have nearly the range it says it does. I’d say at best it’s about half.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Charging
customer_reviews.text: After a year and two months, like many other reviewers have written in their reviews, the monitor doesn’t take a charge. So unfortunate because the range is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: ADY

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is zero
customer_reviews.text: It’s not what I expected. Depending on the price, I believe picture quality is zero. An indoor camera I bought for 49$ picture quality is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shibaz Abdulla

customer_reviews.title: Love this video monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this video monitor on sale on Prime Day and I've been using it everyday since. The screen is a good size, the picture is clear and it has nice features like music and a mic. Sometimes the monitor loses signal here and there but works well majority of the time.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.  Terrible quality.  Lasted 9 months.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this monitor until it stopped working completely 9 months after purchase and would not charge. Can't believe it only lasted 9 months for the price. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie  Wickham

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality video
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor quality video. I really couldn't see my baby at night! I returned this item. Two stars because sound quality was good.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great Well it Lasted
customer_reviews.text: The micro USB charging port inside the monitor broke after 9 months of daily use, we ended up replacing it with a different unit.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Received as promised. It is a baby shower gift ...
customer_reviews.text: Received as promised. It is a baby shower gift, so can't review otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: sallycam

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the auto shut off to decrease unnecessary radiation exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Ctown

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this monitor and the overall customer service of Phillips Avent! I have three of these monitors and will shortly be ordering our 4th for our next addition to the family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The monitor itself is fine, but the range is really poor. If I had to do it over again I'd deprioritize picture quality for increased range.
customer_reviews.author: Robby King

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. Has lots of features
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Has lots of features. The only thing I wish it had on it was a clock.
customer_reviews.author: hershy86

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: The monitor stopped charging after 1 year of use. It was good otherwise, but expected it to last longer given the price. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent baby monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two other monitors and returned them prior to finding this one. This is the best monitor out there IMO. It has tons of very well thought of features and the video clarity is excellent for a baby monitor, even at night. It has a mode where the video and sound only comes on when the noise in baby's room becomes higher than the threshold you pick. This is a savior at night and has allowed us to sleep better. It has a great battery life and also an excellent signal around the house. It has never lost a signal. Overall an excellent monitor and I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Practical and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Practical and easy to use. The only issue that I have is that sometimes the audio goes off.
customer_reviews.author: Kiarinna Parisi

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Device In Range !!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed as the signal range kept lost in distance less than 20 meters indoor, although it’s mentioned on the package that the range reaches up to 50 meters.
customer_reviews.author: IHAB GHAZI MILYANI

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: Was fine for a year until the charging port broke! Very disappointing for how expensive the unit is.
customer_reviews.author: talya926

customer_reviews.title: So thankful for this monitor! We had to test ...
customer_reviews.text: So thankful for this monitor! We had to test several monitors to see which would reach from our room to the nursery and this was the only one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Video stopped working after three days
customer_reviews.text: Monitor video stopped working after 3 days. Audio still worked. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Camera not working in after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The camera is not working now, after my baby is four months old. I was not expecting this short life. Is the guarantee valid out of US? Is it global?
customer_reviews.author: Bahadir Ayata

customer_reviews.title: Good but poor definition on the night cam
customer_reviews.text: It works fine but poor definition on the night cam, which is pretty much the lighting that you would have if the baby is asleep.
customer_reviews.author: PATTY

customer_reviews.title: Intermittent sound
customer_reviews.text: Video is good quality but sound feed is not constant. It has a pre-set frequency for audio feed, therefore image and sound do not match
customer_reviews.author: AI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love love this monitor. Well worth the money.Holds charge well, clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: High quality no frills baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Way better quality than a few other brands we tried. Night vision works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: The unit is sturdy and performs to expectations
customer_reviews.text: The price is a bit on higher side - that is the only negative.The unit is sturdy and performs to expectations. It is real easy to use and the battery is long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Roders

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would lose connection after 1 meter. Had to return because the problem couldn't be solved. Bought a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Sound stops working
customer_reviews.text: The sound stopped working after 1 month of use. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. High definition. Sensitive to noise. You can play music while you are in the other room. Rechargable parent unit
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim Gharbieh

customer_reviews.title: Had for a few months...so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is good and I like the Eco mode
customer_reviews.author: C Viva

customer_reviews.title: Good value monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and sensitivity. Good range can easily get range 60m away in another building.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Sims

customer_reviews.title: Great range
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and image quality is super! Wish it had multiple cameras option
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Valente

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Liked the range and all Disliked the tone sound when no range signal
customer_reviews.author: Black knight

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped charging after 3 months of use! Would not purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this device. Everything about it is just perfect. Thoughtfully made.
customer_reviews.author: Copperbutz

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: the image is not good. A lot of signal interference
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Used it to monitor equipment in the hub of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it to monitor equipment in the hub of a turbine and be able to observe the hub from the ground ~300ft.
customer_reviews.author: David Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase you can make to reassure safety of your child. Extremely happy with the choice I made
customer_reviews.author: Nikolai Morschakov

customer_reviews.title: great baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: works great, connection is perfect and crystal clear through multiple walls.
customer_reviews.author: chillcollins

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after buying (and sending back) the iBaby M6S. I had too many connectivity issues with the iBaby and there were more cons than pros. The Philips is non-wifi, so I had no connectivity issues. I put the camera in the baby's room and was able to walk to the back of the yard (at least 250) with no signal drop. Video is clear. Night vision is a little pixelated but not bad. You can still see the baby clearly. Overall, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jds78

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be able to watch my mom while in bed at night and in the mornings. She has dementia and is wheelchair bound so it was convenient to be able to use the talk back feature even though it freaked her out a little. I bought this in late November and it was nice while it lasted but unfortunately the on button stopped working and it was just past the return deadline so we'll be sticking with Summer Infant. No talk back feature but they are cheaper, the picture is clearer and the unit last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Excellent features. Very helpful. A great product from Avent.
customer_reviews.author: Eliane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This device is good and the coverage range is also good
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Decent video, not very sensitive mic
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and the video quality is decent. There is a slight green tint to the video feed. The microphone isn't as sensitive as we would like. We would prefer to hear the baby when she is just waking up, but the microphone doesn't pick up noises until there is a full whine or cry.
customer_reviews.author: Bigdshaw

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a month now and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Phillips

customer_reviews.title: This is such a good choice for a baby monitor - I used to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good choice for a baby monitor - I used to have a Motorola and it was the biggest regret of my baby-purchasing life. Motorola quality is awful, the hardware is cheap - mine broke completely within the year. This has such a clear picture and every feature you need. Any other feature you think you may need, I promise you, you do not need. Get this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeewur

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, bought for the new baby in the family. Clear sound. Great pic of baby without being seen by "Others". No interruptions from any source...this monitor is well made. I am so pleased. Thought it was a little pricey...but for the safety of baby...and the moms peace of mind...its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge
customer_reviews.text: we love this monitor except that it won't hold a charge. The charger has to be inserted at a specific angle and held down with something heavy and still sometimes doesn't charge (like this morning when the battery drained despite being plugged in and started beeping at 6 am, waking us all up. The worst part is, we already called the company and had the monitor replaced for the same issue, so this is our second one with this problem. I am so frustrated because at this price point there should not be any issues like this!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: If I could leave 0 stars, I would. The monitor doesn't even turn on. Its only use at this point is as a paperweight. And there's no instructions. Either we received a previously returned, broken unit, or this company is literally just ripping people off. The manufacture date is 03/2016 so maybe it's been sitting too long.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Meta

customer_reviews.title: daytime video quality is great, night time is good
customer_reviews.text: daytime video quality is great, night time is good, but we really don't need anything sharper. It has good signal in our home, no problems and very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Quiros

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and faulty
customer_reviews.text: 4 months after purchase and it doesn't charge. $140 paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: They love it. Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son and daughter inlaw for there nursery. They love it. Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Rossbach

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with baby monitor, does exactly what we wanted it to do with no issues, great range and easy viewing in the dark, I almost went with a different brand due to the screen size but I can tell you this is big enough! Also we wanted a monitor that didnt go over wifi due to creepy stories of people hacking in and watching through the camera. This unit has its own wireless connection that doesn't go over wifi (internet). Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Love this, I have been looking for some time for something affordable but also works well and that is exactly what I have gotten. Picture is great and wide screen gets the whole cot in so you don't miss a thing. I have already suggested this to my family who are also needing one. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought Phillips Avent for my friend, who just gave birth to her child. She is happy with the monitor. She says the quality of monitor is very good, even in darkness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Philips AVENT SCD630/37 Video Baby Monitor with FHSS
product_meta.description: See and hear your baby from anywhere in the home. The Philips Avent SCD630/37 Video Baby Monitor enables you to maintain a secure connection with your baby at all times. As well as perfect sound quality, you can now also see your baby, day or night, with a high resolution 3.5” color screen, and an automatic infra-red night vision. You can also soothe your baby by remotely selecting lullabies and by using the soft baby nightlight. With a 100% private connection, and a range up to 900+ feet, this monitor is fully portable and easy to use, and can be voice activated where the screen and volume switch on if your baby starts crying. There is a rechargeable parent unit, and a wall mountable baby unit. LED lights show you when the unit is linked and in range, and there is a backup battery function in case of power failure. Easy to carry. Power supply- 100 – 240Volts / 50 - 60Hertz. Andriod, IOS, Tablet compatible - No
feature_bullets: Baby video monitor with FHSS technology for a secure private connection to your baby with a 3.5" color screen
Wall mountable with automatic infrared night vision
Comfort your little one with the talkback feature, a night light or lullabies, while monitoring the temperature in the room
